Canopy-Rasoi is a one stop solution to every student of IIIT Bhubaneswar for all issues related to Online Mess Coupons Bookings.
Some salient features of this app are :-
*One time login through M-UMS(Hibiscus) password.No other account verification required. *Easy and hassle free Booking on internet as well as intranet. *Interactive and User Friendly UI. *One can see the final layout of his/her coupons of the week. *Bookings can be done anytime from monday to thursday. *Facility to reset user credentials after any change in password of hibiscus. *It contains the menu of food made in both Messes . *Anyone can check their bookings for any day of the week. *Reminder to book Mess Coupons. *Complaint Section where anyone can post any issues related to Mess.
Upcoming features to be introduced shortly in the app are :-
*Setting Default Mess Booking Coupons for upcoming weeks. *Online Transactions for Payment.
